title: 3 and Out -  Mark Davis Allegations, Start Pickett, Pete’s Post-Russ PR, OTA’s
itunes:title: 3 and Out -  Mark Davis Allegations, Start Pickett, Pete’s Post-Russ PR, OTA’s
description:
John discusses reports of Raiders President Dan Ventrelle being fired for blowing the whistle on Mark Davis for harassment, why the NFL would love to replace Davis with another billionaire owner, why the Steelers should just start Kenny Pickett, why Richard Sherman could be a broadcasting star, why Pete Carroll needs to stop hyping up Drew Lock to make the Russ trade look better, and what NFL teams get out of OTA’s.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
